title: Coca-Cola's Move to Take Marijuana Mainstream
description:
Bloomberg News has learned that Coca-Cola is in talks with a Canadian marijuana producer for a drink infused with a chemical derived from marijuana. David Meyers speaks with Bloomberg's Craig Giammona on what Coca-Cola's move to take marijuana mainstream means for one of the world's largest beverage companies.
